title: Rodomonths infernall, or The Diuell conquered Ariastos conclusions. Of the marriage of Rogero with Bradamanth his loue, & the fell fought battell betweene Rogero and Rodomonth the neuer-conquered pagan. Written in French by Phillip de Portes, and paraphrastically translated by G.M.
author: Desportes, Philippe, 1546-1606.
publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for Nicholas Ling,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
